body.name: Rosewater Facial Toner by Cocokind, Multipurpose Spray to Set Makeup, Double Cleanse, and Balance Skins pH, Made with Rose Hydrosol, 4 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 42 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: USDA Organic products are grown and processed according to standards addressing soil and water quality, among other factors.

features: HYDRATE & REFRESH: Soothe & hydrate your face and scalp with our soothing 100% rose hydrosol toner. Can help balance your skin's pH and acts as a second cleaning step
USE ON FACE & SCALP: Use after cleansing your face to pH balance & prep your skin for the rest of your routine; Use on your scalp to sooth & hydrate; Use to set your makeup
SOOTHING: Our fine mist spray can help prep your skin or give an extra hydration boost. Rose ydrosol can help reduce redness, irritation, and supporting blemish prone or sensitized skin
SENSITIVE SKIN FRIENDLY: Our soothing Rosewater Facial Toner is cruelty free, fragrance free, and Vegan

COCOKIND: Skin care products that are earth-friendly without compromising on formulation. Our products are meant to gently deliver the function they promise as well as hydration and skin barrier support, which we believe leads to glowy, happy skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is honestly my favorite rose water spray. It doesn't have an overwhelming smell like sprays I've tried from other brands. It feels so refreshing on my face and hair. It's never given me any sort of bad reaction and I have sensitive skin so I'm really happy about that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE TONER YOU NEED
reviews.reviewText: This is pure rose water and that’s what I love about this so much. Other rose toners have extra things in it. Rosewater does help brighten skin tone and keeps it hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It literally smells like roses, makes your skin glow, and feels amazing. 10 out of 10, if you are looking for a face spray, I suggest this highly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Out of all the products I used and this one does the job!
reviews.reviewText: I used so many different products that costed me a lot to get rid of my melasma, and this one actually did it!Since I used this miracle product, it has made my melasma fade away immensely and it’s nearly almost gone!This is honestly now my favorite thing to use.I’m not saying that everyone that has melasma will notice the results, as I’m mixed race, but it does work on my skin great! Plus it balanced out my pH levels too, as I’ve had oily skin.Also their other products are great too, as I use their green tea balm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice light toner
reviews.reviewText: Nice light toner, did an ok job

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I really like this rosewater
reviews.reviewText: I really like this rosewater. I gave it two stars for two reasons; it came poorly packaged and leaked. The cocokind box it comes in was completely soaked (luckily the box was wrapped in plastic so the shipping box wasn't affected). But, the bottle was not broken and I haven't had any leaks since. Second reason for 4 stars is I feel this is overpriced for the size. You can purchase organic rosewater for half the price at Whole Foods and other grocery stores. Not sure this is worth the price plus shipping.That being said, it is a very nice toner for sensitive skin. I also use it to cleanse in the mornings after I splash my face with water (I don't use cleansers in the morning). My skin doesn't break out or have any adverse reaction to this (most other toners cause my face to fill up with blemishes, redness, irritation, etc).This also has a VERY strong and earthy rose scent which I personally don't mind. But if you're not into the smell of rosewater, you're not going to like this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go-to toner for combo skin
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner. I've used it as a make-up remover (works great and gets all eye make-up) as well as an after-shower clarifying toner for breakouts. The scent is light and clean without being overpowering and the tiny bottle lasts a long time thanks to it being a misting-type spray that I can put right on a cotton pad. I love how gentle it is on my skin, but thorough. I would recommend this to anyone with any skin type. It's perfectly balanced and no issues on sensitive skin like mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective for Oily, Acne Prone Skin
reviews.reviewText: My akin has changed ever since using this product! I wouldn't say it's clear, I get stress acne... But it's quite moisturizing and is effective at toning. My face feels balanced after spritzing on after a cleansing. It smells really nice! Kind of like lychee. I bkught this as an alternative to 100% Pure's discontinued one and I've been supporting this brand ever since. The amount of product you get is actually pretty decent for the price point. The only qualm I have is for the spray nozzle. It releases too much product in a clumsy manner, so I just spray it on my clean hands and pat it onto my face. I know msny use cotton pads but I find they absorb too much.
One of my fav toners ever!Gentil and naturalSmells greatAlso great to fix your makeup
